item1:
程序基本数据维护
Program basic data maintenance
item2:
管理立库程序的基本数据、是否启用
Manage the basic data of the WES program, whether to enable it
item4:
有管理权限的使用者
Users with administrative rights
item5:
程序编码、程序名称
Program ID, program name
输出
item6:
程序基本数据
Program basic data
异常处里
item7:
如果无符合条件的程序数据，系统将提示查无此程序信息
If there is no qualified program data, the system will prompt to check for no program information
如果因为网路中断产生的异常，须结束WES软件，请网路管理人员恢复网路后再重启WES
If the WES software needs to be terminated due to an abnormality caused by a network interruption, ask the network administrator to restore the network and restart WES
操作步骤
item8:
1. 输入查询条件或挑选程序编码后点选Query查询程序数据
Enter query conditions or select program code and click Query to query program data
2. 输入程序基本信息后，如已存在系统内的点选Update更新；不存在系统的点选Create建创新的程序
After entering the basic information of the program, click Update if it already exists in the system; click Create if there is no system to create an innovative program
3. 点选功能菜单Refresh可清除画面上的数据回到初始状态
Click refresh to clear the data on the screen and return to the initial state
4. 点选功能菜单Exit或关闭视窗可结束此作业
Click the function menu exit or close window to end this job
后置条件
item9:
执行S050 Program Authorization by Group或S060 Program Authorization by User确认程序的使用权限
Execute S050 Program Authorization by Group or S060 Program Authorization by User to confirm the use right of the program
备注
